creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: square; center formed by 16 squares of geometric pattern cross stitch with center diamond appliques in orange and green;  bordered on 3 sides by orange and brown couduroy; top band and ties removed; print lining
title: Baby Carrier
